description: The Isle of Man government has announced plans to test 5,000 people by the end of July.
title: Coronavirus: Isle of Man to begin antibody testing
title_page: Coronavirus: Isle of Man to begin antibody testing - BBC News
maintext: Further amendments to the repatriation scheme were also announced and, from 11 June, a small number of those returning to the island will be allowed to travel by air instead of the two weekly sailings from Heysham.
